snippet.title: CHERNOBYLITE 2 ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
CHERNOBYLITE 2: EXCLUSION ZONE
ANNOUNCED FOR PC & CONSOLES FOR 2025!

Read more & wishlist here: https://bit.ly/Chernobylite2

Today is an important day for the entire team at The Farm 51. We are proud to announce that intensive work is underway on Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone!

Combined with our accumulated experience from the previous game, some time ago we started working on the sequel - a post-apocalyptic action-RPG. The upcoming Chernobylite 2 game will feature:

- explore and analyze an open and immersive world in first-person perspective - you won't miss a single detail
- character development, expanding your base and creating your own team
- brutal combat with diverse enemies in third-person perspective - gain full control over your character
- planewalking, i.e. travel between dimensions
- dealing with various factions in the Zone
- cooperative missions
- ...and much more!

We will be revealing more as time goes on. If you want to keep up to date with what's happening around Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone, add the game to your wishlist now!

And don't forget to follow us here, on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Discord or Reddit!
See you soon!

#Chernobylite2 #Chernobyl #ExclusionZone
